name: Minigolf (itch) (Lomikron)
description:
This is a very basic minigolf game developed for the Indie Game Dev Beginners Game Jam.

Drag with left mouse button or touch screen and release to push the ball. Hold right mouse button to zoom out and get an overview of the level.

This is the first game i ever made and still has some bugs and only a few levels.

It runs on the fantasy console WASM-4 and is written in Rust.

You can find the source code here.

I used the following color palette: https://lospec.com/palette-list/ayy4
